page.title: 09SPECIAL EVENTS IN WESTBURY
page.content: The first event of the year is the New Year Dance held at the "Pavilion", Westbury's village hall.Next comes a children's party around Twelfth Night In February a St.Valentine Dance and a general knowledge quiz for clubs.Near Easter come A.G.M.'s for the Church and Parish Councils when annual reports are heard.In June there have been gymkhana and now dog shows with lurcher racing.The village fete is run by the church usually for fabric funds in July.On the first Saturday in September is the Horticultural Show an ancient festival successfully revived in the last few years.The Harvest Festival and Supper (not necessarily on the same day) come next.Halloween usually provides an opportunity for a dance.Finally on Boxing Day morning a sporting contest is enjoyed at the Pavilion.
